--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>        "I'm not sure what's happening right now Trinity.  But 
something very 
> bad happened.  Nightlight, will you take her inside and talk to her 
about it. 
>  She has a right to know too."  He looks at her pleadingly.
